title: "Ok Google" stuck listening when phone is locked
content:
When my Pixel 3a is locked "Ok google" works but then ot seems to be stucked during listening. It doesn't recognize any words and listening dots are stretched all the time. I need to say "ok google" second time to make it works. The video:
https://drive. google.com/file/d/1Iad0gLV-eqgOvuYtYpHybzqkFl-BSDmu/view?usp=sharing
